- Env.
latest nightly (20100120) on Win32/Mac.  Although I don't test this on Linux, it will occur.

- Step
1. open attached file
2. turn on [View] - [Zoom] - [Zoom Text only]
3. zoom in or zoom out using mouse wheel

- Result
transitionend is fired.  In this sample, Text (None) is replaced with current Text.   If turned off zoom text only, this doesn't occur.
